name: Gelatinous Cube
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

traits.Ooze Cube: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw.
traits.Transparent: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15+1d4 + 13 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

actions.Pseudopod: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.
actions.Engulf: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Dexterity saving throw.
